verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֛ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> Manasseh בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> But did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹת֙ <WH8441> like unto the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> had cast out יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <WH7725> again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> For he built אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִתַּ֖ץ <WH5422> had broken down יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> and he reared up מִזְבְּח֤וֹת <WH4196> altars לַבְּעָלִים֙ <WH1168> for Baalim וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> and made אֲשֵׁר֔וֹת <WH842> groves וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> and worshipped לְכָל־ <WH3605> all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> and served אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וּבָנָ֥ה <WH1129> Also he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> altars בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> of which אָמַ֣ר <WH559> had said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whereof the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> In Jerusalem יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become שְּׁמִ֖י <WH8034> shall my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> be for ever

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> altars לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהוּא֩ <WH1931> he הֶעֱבִ֨יר <WH5674> to pass through אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֤יו <WH1121> his children בָּאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> the fire בְּגֵ֣י <WH1516> in the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> of Hinnom וְעוֹנֵ֤ן <WH6049> also he observed times וְנִחֵשׁ֙ <WH5172> and used enchantments וְֽכִשֵּׁ֔ף <WH3784> and used witchcraft וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> and dealt א֖וֹב <WH178> with a familiar spirit וְיִדְּעוֹנִ֑י <WH3049> and with wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <WH7235> much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> he wrought הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <WH3707> to provoke him to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <WH7760> And he set אֶת־ <WH853> פֶּ֥סֶל <WH6459> a carved image הַסֶּ֖מֶל <WH5566> the idol אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he had made בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> of which אָמַ֤ר <WH559> had said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of which God אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> to David וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH970> young מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> before all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> will I put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> my name לְעֵילֽוֹם׃ <WH5865> for ever

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and I will not אוֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> Neither will I any more לְהָסִיר֙ <WH5493> remove אֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> the foot יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from out הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתִּי <WH5975> which I have appointed לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> for your fathers רַ֣ק ׀ <WH7535> but אִם־ <WH518> so that יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> they will take heed לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> to do אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <WH6680> all that I have commanded לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <WH8451> them according to the whole law וְהַֽחֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> and the ordinances בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses

וַיֶּ֣תַע <WH8582> to err מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> So Manasseh אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> [and] to do רָ֔ע <WH7451> worse מִן־ <WH4480> more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> than the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <WH8045> had destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> to Manasseh וְאֶל־ <WH413> and עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> and to his people וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no הִקְשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <WH7181> but they would not hearken

וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> brought יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Wherefore the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> upon them the captains of הַצָּבָא֙ <WH6635> the host of אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַיִּלְכְּד֥וּ <WH3920> which took אֶת־ <WH853> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> Manasseh בַּחֹחִ֑ים <WH2336> among the thorns וַיַּֽאַסְרֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH631> and bound him בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH5178> with fetters וַיּוֹלִיכֻ֖הוּ <WH1980> and took בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> him to Babylon

וּכְהָצֵ֣ר <WH6887> And when he was in affliction ל֔וֹ חִלָּ֕ה <WH2470> he besought אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God וַיִּכָּנַ֣ע <WH3665> and humbled מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> himself greatly מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> accept אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> of his fathers

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> And prayed אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him וַיֵּעָ֤תֶר <WH6279> unto him and he was intreated לוֹ֙ וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> of him and heard תְּחִנָּת֔וֹ <WH8467> his supplication וַיְשִׁיבֵ֥הוּ <WH7725> and brought him again יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem לְמַלְכוּת֑וֹ <WH4438> into his kingdom וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> knew מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> Then Manasseh כִּ֥י <WH3588> that יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD ה֥וּא <WH1931> he הָֽאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> he [was] God

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> Now after this כֵ֡ן <WH3651> this בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> he built חוֹמָ֣ה <WH2346> a wall חִֽיצוֹנָ֣ה ׀ <WH2435> without לְעִיר־ <WH5892> the city דָּוִ֡יד <WH1732> of David מַעְרָבָה֩ <WH4628> on the west side לְגִיח֨וֹן <WH1521> of Gihon בַּנַּ֜חַל <WH5158> in the valley וְלָב֨וֹא <WH935> even to the entering in בְשַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate הַדָּגִים֙ <WH1709> at the fish וְסָבַ֣ב <WH5437> and compassed לָעֹ֔פֶל <WH6077> about Ophel וַיַּגְבִּיהֶ֖הָ <WH1361> and raised it up מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> a very great height וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> and put שָֽׂרֵי־ <WH8269> captains חַ֛יִל <WH2428> of war בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> in all the fenced בִּיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַ֠יָּסַר <WH5493> And he took away אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> gods הַנֵּכָ֤ר <WH5236> the strange וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסֶּ֙מֶל֙ <WH5566> and the idol מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> out of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַֽמִּזְבְּח֗וֹת <WH4196> and all the altars אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֛ה <WH1129> that he had built בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in the mount בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem וַיַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <WH7993> and cast ח֥וּצָה <WH2351> [them] out לָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

[וַיָּכֶן כ] (וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH3559> certain ק) אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <WH2076> and sacrificed עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and זִבְחֵ֥י <WH2077> offerings שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> thereon peace וְתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> and thank offerings וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and commanded לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah לַעֲב֕וֹד <WH5647> to serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

אֲבָל֙ <WH61> Nevertheless ע֣וֹד <WH5750> still הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people זֹבְחִ֖ים <WH2076> did sacrifice בַּבָּמ֑וֹת <WH1116> still in the high places רַ֖ק <WH7535> but לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [yet] unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts מְנַשֶּׁה֮ <WH4519> of Manasseh וּתְפִלָּת֣וֹ <WH8605> and his prayer אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֱלֹהָיו֒ <WH430> unto his God וְדִבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> and the words הַֽחֹזִ֔ים <WH2374> of the seers הַֽמְדַבְּרִ֣ים <WH1696> that spake אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> to him in the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנָּ֕ם <WH2005> behold עַל־ <WH5921> are among דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> behold they [are written] in the book מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וּתְפִלָּת֣וֹ <WH8605> His prayer וְהֵֽעָתֶר־ <WH6279> also and [how God] was intreated לוֹ֮ וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חַטָּאת֣וֹ <WH2403> of him and all his sin וּמַעְלוֹ֒ <WH4604> and his trespass וְהַמְּקֹמ֗וֹת <WH4725> and the places אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which בָּנָ֨ה <WH1129> wherein he built בָהֶ֤ם בָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> high places וְהֶעֱמִיד֙ <WH5975> and set up הָאֲשֵׁרִ֣ים <WH842> groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֔ים <WH6456> and graven images לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הִכָּנְע֑וֹ <WH3665> he was humbled הִנָּ֣ם <WH2005> behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <WH3789> behold they [are] written עַ֖ל <WH5921> in דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> among the sayings חוֹזָֽי׃ <WH2335> of the Hozai

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> So Manasseh עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֖הוּ <WH6912> and they buried בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> him in his own house וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אָמ֥וֹן <WH526> and Amon בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twenty וּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <WH8147> [was] two שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years אָמ֣וֹן <WH526> Amon בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> two שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> But he did הָרַע֙ <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> as did מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> Manasseh אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַפְּסִילִ֗ים <WH6456> unto all the carved images אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> had made מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> which Manasseh אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father זִבַּ֥ח <WH2076> sacrificed אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> for Amon וַיַּֽעַבְדֵֽם׃ <WH5647> and served

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not נִכְנַע֙ <WH3665> And humbled מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> not himself before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כְּהִכָּנַ֖ע <WH3665> had humbled מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> as Manasseh אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ה֥וּא <WH1931> he אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> himself but Amon הִרְבָּ֥ה <WH7235> more and more אַשְׁמָֽה׃ <WH819> trespassed
וַיִּקְשְׁר֤וּ <WH7194> conspired עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> against עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> And his servants וַיְמִיתֻ֖הוּ <WH4191> against him and slew בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> him in his own house

וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> slew עַם־ <WH5971> But the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקֹּֽשְׁרִ֖ים <WH7194> all them that had conspired עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> against king אָמ֑וֹן <WH526> Amon וַיַּמְלִ֧יכוּ <WH4427> king עַם־ <WH5971> and the people הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֶת־ <WH853> יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <WH2977> Josiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
